newsitem.title: UK: Division Group shares drop after results.
newsitem.headline: Division Group shares drop after results.

text.p: Shares in virtual reality specialist Division Group Plc fell sharply on Tuesday after the company posted disappointing annual results.
The stock was down 12-1/2p at 57-1/2p by 1200 GMT.
The group posted a reduced pretax loss of 1.68 million stg for the year ended October 31 compared with a 3.89 million stg loss a year earlier, but analysts said that was still disappointing.

"People were expecting better figures," one trader said. "A lot of people had been buying them (the shares) up to the results. They (the results) weren't that bad, but not as good as people were expecting."
